programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and surrounded by five countries, Ethiopia is one of east Africa's forgotten lands. Seemingly passive deserts in fact seethe with fire, and cloud-piercing peaks shield a secret Eden of canyons and cliff-tops teeming with life.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Zambezi: Wild Water
programme.desc: The Zambezi is one of Africa's most influential rivers. It supports some of the continent's most spectacular wildlife. However, the Zambezi's long and winding journey destroys, as well as creates.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert
programme.desc: The Okavango Delta, a huge emerald oasis in the burning heart of the Kalahari desert, is fed by the Okavango River and this perpetual cycle of wet and dry is the lifeblood of this extraordinary natural Eden.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Zanzibar: Land of Giants
programme.desc: The Zanzibar Archipelago has been labeled the most exotic island chain in the world. Pristine sands and azure blue sea make it a much loved holiday destination. /The Caribbean is a tropical paradise. Each of the 7,000 islands are unique.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden
programme.desc: The Galapagos archipelago contains 13 main islands and a hundred or so smaller rocks and reefs. The region's wilderness is so pristine and rich in life. / Lying like a teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention.

programme.title: Management: Management (2009)

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Noah in the timeless story of courage, sacrifice, and hope. This visually stunning, action-adventure is hailed as "one of the most unforgettable Biblical epics ever put on film." *Richard Roeper, Chicago-Sun-Times

programme.desc: After being sent to the Maximum Security Zone in The Facility, Yusei risks being permanently placed in lockdown when he decides to duel Chief Armstrong in order to win a pardon for his pal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Lockdown Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: As the clash between Yusei and the Chief comes to a shocking conclusion, Yusei must figure out a way to win the battle before his life points get zapped to zero.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 32
programme.desc: The two weakest teams from the Instant Restaurant Street Party Challenge face off in Sudden Death at Kitchen HQ. Two teams both cooking their hearts out in an elimination that will shatter dreams.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 33
programme.desc: Tonights tests include the ultimate plating challenge; a teammate test using set ingredients; and a test to produce the ultimate luxury fine dining meal.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 34
programme.desc: Its Ultimate Instant Restaurant time with the biggest dinner parties ever seen on MKR! Eight teams return to their own homes to cook for 16 guests.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 35
programme.desc: Record holders, Amy & Tyson, are concocting one of the most obscure menus imaginable! But when youre playing to a critical crowd, will these risky moves be their ultimate downfall?

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 36
programme.desc: Foodie friends Della & Tully need to shake off their demons but at the table, old rivals change their tune.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Invisible Death
programme.desc: Poison is an almost invisible form of death, and toxicologists must look for hidden clues in blood and tissue to bring these murders to light.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Loved To Death
programme.desc: A victim usually never foresees danger when the perpetrator turns out to be a friend or a lover. Science and microscopic evidence can unmask these killers and find justice for those who are Loved To Death.

programme.title: The New Detectives: True Crime
programme.desc: They know as much about crime as any crime fighter, or any criminal. They're the crime writers, and through their eyes we see murder most foul.

programme.title: The New Detectives: At Close Range
programme.desc: When a victim is gunned down at point-blank range, police often assume that a friend or acquaintance is to blame.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Critical Evidence
programme.desc: To the astute detective and forensic specialist, the biggest clues often hide in plain sight, and what seems trivial to some is in reality Critical Evidence.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs cater for 40 `glampers' before a hectic dinner service which leads to a difficult decision for the chefs and Gordon himself. Someone will have to pay the ultimate price and be forced to leave the competition at this late stage.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four remaining chefs are reunited with their loved ones for a taste test, with the winner dining out with their family at a posh restaurant.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon's top two feel the pressure as they prepare their final menus. The pair do not have long to ponder and consider whether a simple or more adventurous approach will win the day.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This season's contestants head to Las Vegas where they participate in the signature dish challenge; the winners of the challenge ride on the world's tallest Ferris wheel while the losers peel 50 pounds of shrimp and 1,000 pounds of potatoes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have 20 minutes to see which team can produce the most shrimp dumplings; rapper The Game attends the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are given a communication challenge. VIP guests for dinner service include astronaut Buzz Aldrin.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidsons, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An old client brings in Ian to build a classic 54 Chevy pickup truck from the ground up with some major custom upgrades.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ians most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel delivers the fabrication goods as he transplants an old 1948' cab onto a modern roll-off truck and creates one bad-ass trash truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel brings his wild fabrication skills into the world of Volkswagen bugs, as he turns a stock bug into a full custom.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel enters the motorcycle world as he tries to turn a childhood dream into a reality by building a wild chopper trike from the ground up.

programme.title: Andromeda: An Affirming Flame
programme.desc: Dylan protects the Andromeda from mercenaries while Beka starts to wonder if they are fighting for the wrong side.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan finds a space station full of kids who believe he is there to bring peace by killing their enemies.

programme.title: Andromeda: D Minus Zero
programme.desc: The Andromeda crew is still learning how to work together as they are attacked by the Restorers.

programme.title: Andromeda: Double Helix
programme.desc: The Andromeda gets involved in a feud between a Than planet and a Nietzschean colony.

programme.title: Andromeda: Angel Dark, Demon Bright
programme.desc: A slipstream sends the Andromeda back in time to just before the Commonwealth fell. The crew must intervene to preserve history.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Lost Soul
programme.desc: In 1985, 25-year-old Luana 'La Verne' Williams disappeared from her Tauranga home. Eight years later her disappearance was upgraged to a murder enquiry. Her body has never been found.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: In Too Deep
programme.desc: In 1999, Kiwi engineer Aaron Hopa and his English colleague Robert Glazzard were murdered on board a survey ship in the Persian Gulf in.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Taken for a Ride
programme.desc: 54 year old Simon Buis was savagely beaten and kicked to death in an Auckland park in 1980 by persons unknown. To this day, his killers have evaded capture.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: 19-year-old Joan Wech left New Zealand for the bright lights of Sydney. But the first step on her overseas adventure would be her last. Was this a robbery gone wrong, a savage random attack or a revenge killing by a jealous ex-lover?

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Death in a Heartbeat / The Body in the Bag
programme.desc: CI examines the Dr. Victor Chang extortion murder as well as the horrific Jane Doe Case where a girl is found lying on the side of the road of an inner Sydney suburb wrapped in two plastic garbage bags.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Thicker Than Water
programme.desc: Alex and Marcus come to blows over the future of Killarney, and Marcus reveals a secret that will change their lives forever. Jodi is determined to help Riley make peace with his dying father.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Reaching Out
programme.desc: Jodi questions her sanity when she is haunted by visions of her ancestor Emma McLeod and a murdered convict. Patrick accidentally destroys a historic trophy belonging to Drovers Run.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Returned Favour
programme.desc: Riley and Matt both declare their love for Jodi, but who will she choose? Stevie risks losing Alex when she helps Marcus with a secret cattle deal. Jodi's horse Tucker is bitten by a tiger snake.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Of Hearts and Hunters
programme.desc: Jodi faces a gut-wrenching decision when Matt is forced back into witness protection - will she choose love over Drovers Run? It's sibling rivalry gone mad when Marcus and Alex compete to woo Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Climb Every Mountain
programme.desc: Kate uncovers the shocking truth about Jodi and Matt's murder. Meg returns for Jodi's funeral with a bizarre secret. Alex takes drastic action to prove how much he loves Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sisters Are Doing It For Themselves
programme.desc: Regan tries to reconcile with her wild-at-heart sister Grace McLeod, after Grace inherits part-ownership of Drovers Run. Riley is seduced by a sexy cowgirl, with disastrous results while Kate is determined to prove her bizarre farming methods to Marcus.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Chad Hallock, the co-founder of Budget Blinds, the largest window covering Franchise Company in the United States, is going undercover and posing as an out of work artist looking for a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canadas largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive behind the scenes look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Lisa Lisson, the first female president of FedEx Express Canada, goes undercover to find out if her employees have the right resources to provide exceptional service in the fiercely competitive courier industry.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Century of Haunting
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Oxford, Massachusetts to help a family in need. The house has been in the Voas family for two generations, and lots of activity has been reported, from apparitions to shadow figures.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Home Is Where the Haunt Is

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Courage
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Boot Camp
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today, Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Friends and Neighbors
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Set-Up
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Searchers
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Buddha's Delight
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hot Tub Grime Machine
programme.desc: The guys realize that Godwin has never really asked them for a favor, even though they are all always helping each other out. Godwin asks them to help him get a hot tub, so they set out to help him pick one up.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A-Jase-ent Living
programme.desc: Due to construction at Jase and Missy's house, Willie and Korie invite Jase and the kids to live with them while Missy is out of town visiting friends. Then, what begins in the duck call room as a series of "Gentlemen's Bets".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Termite Be a Problem
programme.desc: Because of a termite problem at Duck Commander, the guys are forced to find a different location to work from - Godwin's House. But while at Godwin's house, Godwin gets a taxidermied gift from a past relative.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: John Luke After Dentist
programme.desc: John Luke and Sadie are getting some dental work done, complete with sedation, and it's up to Willie and Korie to take care of them through the process - including getting them back home safely.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Several SAR teams are called out after 200 snowmobilers arereported buried on Boulder Mountain near Revelstoke BC.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR extracts a severely injured stunt snowmobiler. And later, teams search for two people swept down a raging river.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesnt get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts shes the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she wont stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richards 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaelas constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Like a Virgin
programme.desc: Emily is 29 and a virgin. The pressure from her boyfriend Romeo to have sex is overwhelming. Their 20 year age difference may be part of the problem because she chats it up more with strangers than him. Can Judge Toler help them find common ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy Sexy Cool
programme.desc: Stephen says Kisha is crazy and can snap in a split second, especially with his mom. He claims she accuses him of cheating, but Kisha is the one bit obsessed with one of her exes still.

programme.title: Divorce Court: House Car
programme.desc: Latoya Ward and Davarius Greaves are back for round two! Latoya wants Davarius to become a stay at home dad because he cant keep a job. Davarius says Latoya sabotages any work he can get and goes out of her way to create hostile environments.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Back in the Hood
programme.desc: Today, Dog's bounty is about to take him on a trip down memory lane and test his investigative chops. With each lead propelling him closer and closer to his childhood haunts, Dog uses old-fashioned detective skills to track his prey.

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Zamboni?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hairy Situations
programme.desc: First, things get hairy when Sonia and Lyndah repo from outside a wig shop. Next, everybody's crying when Lou and Froy's repossession from a young couple ends with a pepper spray to everyone's face. And finally, Froy, Sonia, and Lou repo the targeted car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Interview with the Repo Man
programme.desc: Things get a lot more complicated for the team when Sonia snaps and puts herself on the business end of a knife and the gangbanger wielding it. Froy and Sonia wind up in the middle of a relationship dispute with an absent-minded professor who's got...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Gypsy Games
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Lou's Big Gamble
programme.desc: It's a brand new start for the Operation Repo team when Lou bets big on a high-risk opportunity and sets up shop in Las Vegas! But first, Ronnie and Froy must wrangle a wrestling ring from a Lucha Libre school.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Welcome Back Rotter
programme.desc: Matt and Froy crash the meeting of a fraternal lodge to ask for a car, but instead, they get an angry old man with a rifle. Froy and Matt go on a repo that turns into a battle royale.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Segway This Way
programme.desc: First, Matt and Sonia hit the beach to repossess an old-fashioned classic surfer car from an old-fashioned surfer looking for a classic tussle. Then, Froy and Matt stretch their wits to identify and take down an uncooperative Segway renter.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Cement Mixer
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah, and Sonia fight not only with them but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Rolling Away
programme.desc: First, Lou, Sonia, and Froy have to push away a debtor while trying to push a classic car up a hill and onto the flatbed. And later, Matt and Froy head out on a repo for a BMW, but when the camera guy refuses to leave the car and Matt's lunch starts to...

programme.title: Operation Repo: Frankie'd Up Beyond All Recognition
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking...

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Soccer Episode
programme.desc: Young Kevin gets a kick out of soccer, but Nick doesn't see the appeal. Meanwhile, Lindsey's secretiveness exasperates Suzanne, who then snoops online into her teen daughter's private life.

programme.title: The Game: Blank Canvases
programme.desc: Blue helps Keira prepare for an audition, resulting in an intimate "first" moment for the couple. Meanwhile, after Tasha tells Rick her intentions to break things off with Pookie, she is caught off guard by animpromptu proposal instead.

programme.title: The Game: The Pre-Season Game Episode
programme.desc: Blue struggles with his feelings after learning that Keira was a virgin before she slept with him.Jason's suspicions of Chardonnay cheating with Rick comes to a head, resulting in a huge confrontation between Tasha, Jason, Chardonnay and Pookie.

programme.title: The Game: The Busted Episode
programme.desc: Tasha attempts to salvage her friendship with Pookieafter it is revealed she has been cheating on him with Rick. Meanwhile, Jason and Chardonnay have it out over her involvement in Tasha's love triangle.

programme.title: The Game: I'm Not Kelly Pitts
programme.desc: Chardonnay must hide her friendship with Tasha from Jason while simultaneously dealing with the re-emergance of his football persona.

programme.title: The Game: I Love Luke...AHH!
programme.desc: Blue and Keira get into a conflict over what his role is when he breaks up a moment between her and her co-star. Meanwhile, Malik is devastated when he learns his past is preventing him from advancing in his future.

programme.title: The Game: Photo-Shoot Fresh
programme.desc: Can Chardonnay walk down the aisle without a hitch? Will Tasha find out who her baby's father is? Will Blue and Keira work out their problems (again)? All this and more on the season 7 finale.

programme.title: The Game: Psh!! I'm Good!!
programme.desc: Blue attempts to apologize to Keira and is spurned when he learns of a visit from a "co-worker." In an attempt to get over his frustration, he takes up Malik's offer to go out for a night on the town and join him.

programme.title: The Game: A Swan Song For Rick And Tasha...
programme.desc: After getting back together, Blue and Keira run into a slight problem when Blue starts to believe that their relationship is contributing to his poor performance.

programme.title: The Game: Miss Me A Little When I'm Gone
programme.desc: Malik gets into a confrontation with his ex-girlfriend's current man, and must choose between her and his current flame. Meanwhile, Blue and Keira have a revealing moment after an argument about how honest their relationship is.

programme.title: The Game: In Treatment
programme.desc: Tasha seeks out counseling from a professional to determine where her datingproblems come from. Eventually Malik stops by, making it a group session with the mother and son duo discovering certain truths about themselves.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Asylum
programme.desc: PRS explores a New York State Prison that was once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the institution's paranormal past and present.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Supernatural Seduction
programme.desc: PRS investigates the Campbell House, where the Innkeeper and guests claim to have sexual encounters with a spirit who has deep ties to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits
programme.desc: Brian's bar has a cranky customer who's got a bad habit of breaking wine glasses. Charlie has been dead since prohibition.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Annison Funeral Parlour
programme.desc: Coffins, murder and a malevolent spirit plague the team as they investigate this one-time funeral home. With one member isolated alone another in a coffin the team catch a poltergeist in action

programme.title: Most Haunted: Capesthorne Hall
programme.desc: The beauty of this magnificent Cheshire country house hides the horror that lies in its corridors. As well a poltergeist activity the team manage to catch some of their best evidence to date and even our sceptic hears noises.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1 of this terrifying place concentrates above ground. The team are alarmed at the results from a new piece of equipment and Yvette meets her match.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesnt disappoint.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oakwell House
programme.desc: The team investigate Oakwell House near Leeds, which was built by ancestors of Fred Batt. In 1684, William Batt returned unexpectedly from a trip to London but vanished leaving a bloody footprint. A demon dog has been seen in the grounds.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: It's a Dog's Life

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the worlds greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Extreme Animals
programme.desc: Extreme Animals features environments hostile to humans, but havens to many animals. Witness gorgeous glow-worms, high flying condors, parched thorny devils, emperor penguins, and polar bears in this journey through life on the edge.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Global Cities
programme.desc: Travel to the centers of wealth, power, industry, and innovation. From London to Tokyo, Hong Kong to New York, these are the cities that never sleep. The influence held in these economic hubs unites the global community.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur The Wrecker/Arthur and The True Francine
programme.desc: Arthur always seems to wreck things, and this time it's Mom's computer. Can he get it fixed before Mom finds out? Then, Muffy A. Crosswire and Francine are absolute best friends, despite their rather obvious differences.

programme.title: Arthur: Making Conversation/A Cloudy Day
programme.desc: Talking to adults makes George want to hide! When he learns he must go to a grown-up party, he turns to his friends for help. Then, Arthur and his friends learn that old silent films can be just as much fun as the movies theyre used to.

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Big Top Trouble/George Blows His Top
programme.desc: Francine is sure she will be a star at circus camp. How hard could it be? Then, George is always more than happy to lend his pals whatever they need. But Buster's borrowing gets out of control.

programme.title: Arthur: The Tattletale Frog/D.W. & Bud's Higher Purpose
programme.desc: When Bud is blamed for an accident D.W. causes, she has to decide whether to let her friend take the fall. D.W. and Bud can't wait to ride a new rollercoaster. Will they make it past the ticket taker, or will they come up short?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster's Secret Admirer/The Last King of Lambland
programme.desc: Buster receives a box of chocolates in the mail from a secret admirer. It's driving him crazy! Who could possibly like him that much? And James receives a gift from his uncle in Scotland--a toy lamb that will give its owner special powers!

programme.title: Arthur: Fern and the Case of the Stolen Story/Sue Ellen Vegges Out
programme.desc: Fern has writer's block! Fortunately, Ladonna's full of stories, and Fern decides to "borrow" the tales and simply change the names. Then, when Sue Ellen decides to stop eating meat, Muffy and Francine compete to be the best vegetarian.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur and D.W. Clean Up/The Long, Dull Winter
programme.desc: Arthur just might make it to Happy Crazy Wow Day at the park--if he and D.W. can work together to clean their rooms! Then, Arthur and the gang realize they are suffering from the January doldrums brought on by an acute lack of holidays.

programme.title: Arthur: Attack Of The Turbo Tibbles/D.W. Tricks The Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: If you think the Tibbles are bad now, imagine what they'd be like if they had super powers! Then, D.W. needs money, quick. When she tries to pull a fast one on the Tooth Fairy, will Arthur have to pay?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's New Puppy/Arthur Bounces Back
programme.desc: Arthur's new puppy is exactly what he wanted. He's cute and wriggly, and he follows Arthur everywhere. But training a puppy is harder than Arthur thought. Then, a mere $10 stands between Arthur and the shoes he's been dreaming about.

programme.title: Battle for the Bulge
programme.desc: The Battle for the Bulge was the last major German offensive move on the Western Front during the Second World War.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: U-Boat War
programme.desc: U-boats posed the deadliest threat to Allied convoys traveling the Atlantic.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Germany
programme.desc: The development of the B-17 bomber, which allowed American planes to reach inside Germany and bomb its cities.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Commerce Raiders
programme.desc: Heavily armed vessels disguised as ordinary cargo ships patrolled allied waters, sinking supply boats and stealing their content.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Fall of Berlin
programme.desc: In 1945, Soviet and American troops press Hitler's armies from the west and the east, culminating in the fall of Berlin.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Okinawa
programme.desc: Kamikaze pilots guard the island of Okinawa from American forces.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of Remagen
programme.desc: German forces retreat across the Rhine on the Remagen bridge near the close of the war.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Mount Hot Rocks (February 19, 1945)
programme.desc: American forces landing on the shores of Iwo Jima encounter Japanese combatants willing to fight to the death.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Battle of the Bulge (December 1944)
programme.desc: The December 1944 battle pitting American forces against German Panzer divisions in the Ardennes Forest.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jarrod & Abby
programme.desc: How do young people who've embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others they've never met in person before. The problem -- that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year. (S3, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Nev and Max receive emails from opposite sides of the same online romance, each concerned that the other may be a catfish! The guys are taken aback when one side decides to follow through with their marriage plans!

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ramon & Paola
programme.desc: Ramon met Paola on Facebook and established an exclusive online relationship. But after many failed attempts to video chat, is she really who he thinks she is? (S2, ep3)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Tracie & Sammie
programme.desc: Tracie Thoms had a connection with a fan named 'Sammie' after hearing about the passing of Sammie's friend. Sammie suddenly disappeared and now Tracie is left wondering who Sammie really is? (S3, ep5)

programme.title: The City: Queen Of Diamonds
programme.desc: Olivia &amp; Erin have different ideas of how to dress Fergie for an ELLE cover shoot, leaving Joe Zee in the middle. A French photographer is interested in Whitney, but she's unsure. (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Twinning
programme.desc: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as bi-curious Deena pulls the robbery on both The Situation and Vinny. Plus, The Situation's 'secret hook-up' with Snooki is revealed. (S4, ep3)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: The boys harass Deena for stealing a girl from Vinny's bed. Ronnie & Sammi are back to their old ways, but this time The Situation is involved in their drama. (S4, ep4)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: And the Wall Won
programme.desc: After causing drama between Ronnie & Sammi for years, The Situation comes to blows with Ronnie. But with The Situation carried out on a stretcher, have things finally gone too far? (S4, ep5)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Umm, Hello
programme.desc: It's boys weekend, and the girls are headed home to see their loved ones. With the girls away, Pauly decides to invite their old roommate, Angelina, to Miami.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Meatball Training Day
programme.desc: Angelina is back in Miami and the house is on full tilt. After years of conflict and turmoil, will Angelina be able to make amends with her old roommates.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Strange Life of Dr. Schwartz

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Afraid of the Dark
programme.desc: A woman spends almost two decades searching for the man who kidnapped her from her bedroom and left her for dead when she was 8 years old.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Expert Witness
programme.desc: This report focuses on the use of expert witnesses in criminal trials and the problems that arise when their testimony is inaccurate or completely false.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in Spokane
programme.desc: A report that focuses on the murders in Spokane, Washington over a period of a little more than two years (1997 - 1999) of at least a dozen women, mostly prostitutes.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Texas Confidential
programme.desc: A report on the 1997 murder of Doris Angleton, the wife of a successful Houston, Texas bookie. Doris husband Bob who claimed that his brother Roger was Doris killer, was tried for the crime in state court and acquitted. But the case did not end there.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon gets to meet Vivacia, the TV horror show hostess of his dreams. Wade Duck is caught in a 60-minute style interview.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: After falling asleep while playing a board game, Jon dreams he and Garfield are in it.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield demonstrates the importance of sound effects. The Wolf convinces the crew aliens have landed.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfields neighbor moves out and rent their house to a singer.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Myron the Mouse tries to goad Garfield into chasing him. Edward R. Furrow is back psychoanalyzing the weasel and Orson.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Great Getaway/Scrambled Eggs/Hansel and Garfield
programme.desc: Jon tries to getaway by going to New York only to find Garfield stowed-away in his suitcase./Sheldon gets mixed up with a turtle egg./Garfield tries to entertain Nermal by telling him a fairy tail.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon buys a new TV from Madam Murray. Wade suggests the Roy Rooster Fan Club be changed to the Wade Duck fan club.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield and Penelope imagine what it would be like to be married.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Clean Sweep/Secrets of the Animated Cartoon/How the West was Lost
programme.desc: Jon gets an automatic dog washer./Orson gives a lecture on cartoon rules and logic./Garfield comes to the rescue when Cactus Jake is fired.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Odielocks/Quack to the Future/Beddy Buy
programme.desc: Garfield tells the story about Odielocks, and the three bears./Orson wishes he had a time machine./When Garfield breaks his bed, Jon buys a new one.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Freeze
programme.desc: Before a statute of limitations expires on a 10-million dollar robbery, the Impossible Missions Force must spring the suspect from prison and dupe him into leading police to the hiding place of the money.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Test Case
programme.desc: The Impossible Missions Force must end the murderous career of a bacteriologist working for the enemy, who has succeeded in developing a mutant strain of a deadly bacteria which could be used as a practical battlefield weapon.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The System

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Glass Cage

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Live Bait

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Good Egg
programme.desc: When the kids find a mysterious, colorful egg in the park, Barney takes them on a trip to Kenya to try to find out what kind of animal could have laid the egg.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Tea-riffic Manners

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Shrinking Blankey - Things I Can Do
programme.desc: Baby Bop's blankey seems to be getting smaller; she's convinced it's shrinking. But Barney shows her that, actually, she is growing. Baby Bop is not sure she likes this idea at first.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Mutant X

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Brennan is forced to return to his criminal past when Mutant X discovers that his old partner is involved in stealing secrets from the Dominion.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Mutant X unearths an old military experiment involving an age-reversal serum and is surprised to discover that Jesse's grandfather is a one of the test subjects.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Discovering that their teammate Lexa is the subject of a covert experiment that is controlling her, the Mutant X team hunts for the doctor responsible.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: When Jesse's life hangs in the balance, Brennan must connect to him and lead him through past memories they've shared in order to save his life.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Arrival
programme.desc: A Taelon shuttle is shot down over Antarctica. There are Jiridians aboard, but two of the passengers escape. When Augur discovers Lili's blood on the ship, he is convinced that she is not dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Forge of Creation
programme.desc: Lili, Vorjak, and the baby flee to find a shuttle to escape Earth. Liam and Sandoval are both tracking them - for different reasons. Augur is on the run from volunteers, but sends a friend (Juliet) to help Liam while he's gone.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: First Breath
programme.desc: A college friend of Renee's resurfaces and leads them on an investigation of the link between the Taelons and a biomedical facility's cloning operation.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: A Senator's daughter is found to have kryss in her system. Liam and Renee suspect the Taelons lied about synthesizing it and there is a new location for production. They believe Federov is involved. Da'an is addicted to kryss.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Limbo
programme.desc: The Taelons lend some of their dwindling core energy to Joshua Doors for a pilot cold fusion project, but the energy is stolen, leaving the Taelons vulnerable. Jonathan Doors lives on as an AI in cyberspace.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Motherlode
programme.desc: Augur is caught and placed in a special prison where he is placed in a sensory deprivation chamber. An amoralist gets him out and wants Augur to help him steal the gold Zo'or has on the mothership. When Liam learns of what happened he tries to find Augur.

programme.title: The Lost World: Divine Right
programme.desc: A riderless horse leads Roxton to a tribe that makes him king. He must either accept the title or face execution, while the rest of the group is captured.

programme.title: The Lost World: Skin Deep
programme.desc: When Marguerite begins acting uncharacteristically nice, the group raises some questions. A stumbling dinosaur in the jungle holds the answer: an alien life force has begun controlling their bodies.

programme.title: The Lost World: London Calling
programme.desc: Nelson discovers a map that shows a way off the plateau, but he has doubts about leaving. The group has to outrun nomads as they follow the route out of the Lost Word.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Prisoner
programme.desc: A shape-shifter convinces Veronica that her parents are in a place called El Dorado. When Veronica takes off without telling the others, she unwittingly releases a powerful giant from captivity.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Games
programme.desc: Empress Centuria orders her Lizardmen to capture Tribune. When her soldiers find him at the treehouse, he, Malone, Marguerite, and Roxton are imprisoned, and thrown into the Gladiators' Arena.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Source
programme.desc: With all of Lost World thirsting for water, the explorers are attacked by raptors. They are aided by a young woman, Ana, and Marguerite becomes interested in her knowledge of the Fountain of Youth.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's 80's superstar turned gardener Kim Wilde vs. Home Front in The Garden visionary Diarmuid Gavin. Helping them cut through the antiques undergrowth from Hertfordshire to Cheshire--in a Jaguar XJS--are Jonathan Pratt and Will Axon.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen and Waldemar Januszczak turn things upside down on the experts. Teaming up against veterans Charles Hanson and Charlie Ross, it's Arty vs. Antiques through Cheshire and Staffordshire--in a stylish Jaguar XJS.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's day one of the new series! Anita Manning and Mark Stacey start their journey in Aberfeldy and head for auction glory in Dundee.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's still anyone's game, as Anita Manning and Mark Stacey travel from Wiston in South Lanarkshire to Edinburgh.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Day three of Anita Manning and Mark Stacey's antique hunt takes them from the Scottish borders to Sunderland, with a remarkable find along the way.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber bites the dating bullet and goes on her first date in two years. Darren and Sassi go shark diving while Chloe pushes herself to the limit in a half marathon. (S8, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: It's a big day for Chloe as Jordan leaves her speechless in Paris. Amber gets ghosted but gets straight back on the horse. Darren's feathers are ruffled when Sassi receives some flowers. (S8, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: The Mums are back. Mia is in a rollercoaster new relationship while Sassi deals with heartbreak and loneliness. Amber struggles with a Threenager, while Chloe spies her dream home. (S9, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: It all kicks off between Sassi and Darren. Mia's relationship is on its last legs. Amber and Ste bury the hatchet. Chloe's feeling the pressure to have a baby, because Jordan is broody. (S9, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: A near death experience leaves Amber and the boys homeless. Parents evening causes strife for Sassi and Darren. Chloe and Jordan's world falls apart. (S9, ep3)

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brothers best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mystery of Slide Mountain
programme.desc: A report that examines evidence and unanswered questions regarding a June 1, 1998 auto accident on Slide Mountain, near Reno, Nevada, that led to the death of Rinette Riella Bergna and left the driver, Rinettes husband Peter with only minor injuries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Spies, Lies and Secrets
programme.desc: A report about the death of Shane Todd, a brilliant, high-tech engineer at a Singapore company who, according to his parents, was murdered because he was unwilling to share secrets that could harm the United States.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Question of Murder
programme.desc: John Maloney, a Wisconsin police officer, was convicted of murdering his estranged wife, Sandy, in 1999. He has always maintained his innocence. After Maloneys conviction, the prosecutor, Joe Paulus, pled guilty to accepting bribes to fix over 20 cases

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Sugar Land Conspiracy
programme.desc: In December 2003, the Whitaker family-- Kent, his wife Tricia, and their sons, Bart and Kevin-- returned home from dinner. Upon entering the house, Kevin and Tricia were fatally shot. The investigation revealed that the murders had been planned by Bart.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: F.B.I. Agent Dale Cooper comes to the logging town of Twin Peaks to investigate the murder of Laura Palmer, a beautiful and popular high school student. While investigating, Agent Cooper slowly learns that strange things are happening.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Harry is attacked by Jones in his sleep. Audrey and Wheeler begin a relationship. Gordon Cole returns with a report that Windom Earle worked with Major Briggs on Project Bluebook. Cole reinstates Cooper in the FBI.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and company find the mysterious petroglyph. Windom Earle befriends a rock 'n roll youth, and tells him tales of places called the White and Black Lodge. Pete helps Catherine open the first puzzle box.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Bobby and Shelly reaffirm their love. Cooper calls Shelly, Donna and Audrey together to warn them about Earle. Briggs shows Cooper a tape of Windom Earle making a report on his quest for the Black Lodge.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Windom Earle sets his sites on the Miss Twin Peaks contest. Lucy chooses a father for her baby. Leo is punished when he frees Major Briggs. Cooper unlocks the key to entering the Black Lodge. Annie and Dale make a commitment to each other.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Agent Cooper follows Windom Earle and Annie into the depths of the Black Lodge. Big Ed and Norma get a shock when Nadine suffers head trauma. Andrew and Pete unlock Eckhardt's final box while Audrey stages her act of civil disobedience.
